channel.description: Recent content in scene on Paul John Cronin

item.title: Database systems
item.description: Database systems are more than just a working knowledge of SQL, but include Hadoop, MapReduce, MRJob, Hive and Spark. Technical skills are among the hard skills that employers can require when hiring a data scientist. Statistical data, platforms for visualising data, processing software and open-source and closed source programs can be common technical skills that a data scientist may possess. SQL (Database Systems) Hadoop and MapReduce MRJob and Hive Spark

item.title: Data visualisation & technical communication
item.description: Data visualisation & technical communication is more than just python graphs - it requires communicating technical ideas clearly, effectively. My excellent data visualisation include Tableau, as well as scientific papers and patents. My data visualisation skills Data visualisation skills includes utilising software and analytical skills to create a graphic record of data that is processed and organised. For instance, a data scientist for a large sales corporation might utilise graphs or charts to illustrate the numerical and statistical data regarding the company’s sales, revenues, assets or debts.
